700803f-a.text:
Corsa Ave., north from Givan Ave., to and including Boston Road. On the left appear the rears of houses facing on the east side of Fenton Ave., and in the background is visible Public School No. 78 on the
north side of Hicks Street.
November 11, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
700803f-a.folder: Corsa Avenue & Givan Avenue, Bronx, NY

701115f-a.text:
Givan Ave. (from left fore to background), east from but not including Corsa Ave., as it crosses Eastchester Road.
November 11, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
701115f-a.folder: Givan Avenue & Corosa Avenue, Bronx, NY
